Name: Dumping snow and ice from piers.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to dumping snow and ice from piers.
BodyName: Committee on Sanitation and Solid Waste Management

History.AgendaNote: Sanitation and Solid Waste Management and Waterfronts

History.Description: This Introduction was Sine Die (Filed, End of Session)

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council:
	Section 1. Section 16-125 of the administrative code of the city of New York is amended to read as follows:
	§16-125 Dumping snow and ice from piers. The commissioner may not cause or authorize snow [and] or ice to be dumped into the waters of the port of New York [, between the piers near the inshore ends].
	§2. This local law shall take effect immediately upon its enactment into law.
